title: PHI Token Price Hits $0.21 on Top Exchanges (PHI)
content: PHI Token (CURRENCY:PHI) traded up 6.1% against the US dollar during the 1 day period ending at 17:00 PM E.T. on June 2nd. In the last week, PHI Token has traded 21% lower  against the US dollar. One PHI Token token can now be bought for approximately $0.21 or 0.00002768 BTC on major exchanges. PHI Token has a market capitalization of $1.06 million and $21,660.00 worth of PHI Token was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours.    Here’s how other cryptocurrencies have performed in the last 24 hours:    Get PHI Token alerts:     Ripple (XRP) traded up 4.3% against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008407 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded 4.2% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003914 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded 0.9% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $1.89 or 0.00024749 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded up 5.3% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0610 or 0.00000799 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded 3.8% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $56.56 or 0.00740923 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded down 1.1% against the dollar and now trades at $0.99 or 0.00012957 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded 9.5% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $3.72 or 0.00048676 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded up 4.8% against the dollar and now trades at $14.71 or 0.00192636 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded up 10.4% against the dollar and now trades at $7.77 or 0.00101838 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded 7.7% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001554 BTC.   PHI Token Token Profile    PHI Token’s total supply is 14,109,443 tokens and its circulating supply is 4,997,395 tokens. PHI Token’s official Twitter account is @PhiToken and its Facebook page is accessible here . PHI Token’s official website is www.phitoken.io .  Buying and Selling PHI Token    PHI Token can be bought or sold on the following cryptocurrency exchanges: Livecoin.  It is usually not presently possible to buy alternative cryptocurrencies such as PHI Token directly using US dollars. Investors seeking to trade PHI Token should first buy Bitcoin or Ethereum using an exchange that deals in US dollars such as Coinbase , Changelly or Gemini. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Bitcoin or Ethereum to buy PHI Token using one of the exchanges listed above.
